dcterms:description: This dataset consists of news articles in Marathi categorized into 3 classes: sports, entertainment, and lifestyle. The dataset contains 4779 records with predefined splits of the train, test, and validation sets.
dcterms:title: IndicNLP News Article Dataset

dcterms:creator: Gaurav Arora
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of Marathi news article headlines of 3 different classes: entertainment, sports, and state. It consists of 12092 records with splits for training, testing, and validation.
dcterms:title: iNLTK Headline Dataset
